original: Yo dukkhasaccaṁ parijānittha so samudayasaccaṁ pajahissatīti? No.
analyzed: yaḥ dukkha saccam parijānittha saḥ samudaya saccam pajahissati iti no

original: Yo vā pana samudayasaccaṁ pajahissati so dukkhasaccaṁ parijānitthāti? No.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana samudaya saccam pajahissati saḥ dukkha saccam parijānittha ati no

original: Yo dukkhasaccaṁ na parijānittha so samudayasaccaṁ nappajahissatīti?
analyzed: yaḥ dukkha saccam na parijānittha saḥ samudaya saccam na ppajahissati iti

original: Ye maggaṁ paṭilabhissanti te dukkhasaccaṁ na parijānittha, no ca te samudayasaccaṁ
analyzed: ye maggam paṭilabhissanti te dukkha saccam na parijānittha no ca te samudaya sacca

original: nappajahissanti. Aggamaggasamaṅgī ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te dukkhasaccañca
analyzed: na ppajahissanti agga magga samaṅgī ye ca puthujjanāḥ maggam na paṭilabhissanti te dukkha saccam ca
na parijānittha samudaya saccam ca na ppajahissanti

original: Yo vā pana samudayasaccaṁ nappajahissati so dukkhasaccaṁ na parijānitthāti?
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana samudaya saccam na pajahissati saḥ dukkha saccam na parijānittha ati

original: Arahā samudayasaccaṁ nappajahissati, no ca dukkhasaccaṁ na parijānittha. Aggamaggasamaṅgī
analyzed: arahā samudaya saccam na ppajahissati no ca dukkha saccam na parijānittha agga magga samaṅgī

original: ye ca puthujjanā maggaṁ na paṭilabhissanti te samudayasaccañca nappajahissanti dukkhasaccañca na parijānittha.
analyzed: ye ca puthujjanāḥ maggam na paṭilabhissanti te samudaya saccam ca na pajahissanti dukkha saccam ca na parijānittha
